content: designed to use up your left over fingering weight yarn this hat can be as colorful or subdued as you like the hat lays flat without a cuff thanks to the latvian braids you don t even have to block it one size fits most heads because the construction makes a soft and springy hat that stays on yarn needed knit picks palette or other fingering weight 100% wool yarn main color 106 yds/23 grams an assortment of fingering weight wool totaling approximately 153 yds 4 5 yds each color per braid pick contrasting colors 1 light and 1 dark for the latvian braid this was not tested with superwash yarn
